thread.title: Fairchild Semiconductor in Deal Talks With ON Semiconductor, Infineon -Bloomberg
thread.title_full: Fairchild Semiconductor in Deal Talks With ON Semiconductor, Infineon -Bloomberg

author: morningstar.com
title: Fairchild Semiconductor in Deal Talks With ON Semiconductor, Infineon -Bloomberg
text:
Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc. (FCS) has held talks about a possible sale of the company with ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) and Infineon Technologies AG (IFNNY, IFX.XE), Bloomberg News reported Wednesday.
Fairchild has hired Goldman Sachs for the sale process, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg.
The chip maker's shares were recently up 21% to $17.12.
Full story at http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2015-10-14/fairchild-semiconductor-said-working-with-bank-to-find-a-buyer
Write to nymonitoring@dowjones.com
 14, 2015 13:38 ET (17:38
